law.catch_line: Armories Furnished By State; Effect On Municipal Responsibility
law.text: When any armory or air installation is furnished by the commonwealth in any city or town, the adjutant general shall notify the city or town where such armory or air installation lies, and thereupon all obligations of said city or town as to said armory or air installation under section one hundred and seventeen, and all allowances and payments by the commonwealth for rent, shall cease, as to the units quartered in said armory or air installation.
